channel.title: Mantis Shrimp - lowey [Experimental EDM]
channel.description:
My latest offering to the music gods:
https://soundcloud.com/lowemasterpro/mantis-shrimp
> The Mantis Shrimp is a kick-ass creature. If you were the same size as a Mantis Shrimp, or if a Mantis Shrimp was the same size as you, then it'd punch your skeleton right out of your skin. > > True story.

item.title: Mantis Shrimp - lowey [Experimental EDM]
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
Thanks Was quite pleased with the drums on this one. And the weird bass / lead sound. Bit different to my usual stuff.

And yes, the Mantis Shrimp is an evil little thing. Amazing, but not the sort of thing you’d want to tangle with. Some people call them “thumb splitters” because, well, that’s what they’ll do to you if you upset them. The Oatmeal did a great strip about them:

The Oatmeal

Why the mantis shrimp is my new favorite animal - The Oatmeal

A comic about a glorious undersea creature.

Read full topic

item.title: Mantis Shrimp - lowey [Experimental EDM]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Awesome man, I love it. The drum samples are thoughtfully selected, the piece has this cool underwater vibe.

Mantis Shrimp is boss for non believers look it up on YouTube. Carnage!

Read full topic

item.title: Mantis Shrimp - lowey [Experimental EDM]
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
My latest offering to the music gods:

https://soundcloud.com/lowemasterpro/mantis-shrimp

The Mantis Shrimp is a kick-ass creature. If you were the same size as a Mantis Shrimp, or if a Mantis Shrimp was the same size as you, then it’d punch your skeleton right out of your skin.

True story.
